name: Smith Machine Close-grip Bench Press
how_to_perform:
1. Adjust the Smith machine to allow you to position your hands closer together than shoulder-width apart.
2. Lie on a flat bench and grasp the bar with hands positioned close together but not touching.
3. Lower the bar down towards your chest, keeping your back pressed into the pad as you move through the range of motion.
4. Focus on using your arms primarily for this movement, trying to reduce reliance on any additional help from the Smith machine.
5. Once the bar reaches just short of touching your chest, pause briefly then begin pushing the bar up towards the ceiling.
6. Continue performing controlled repetitions, taking note of proper form and technique throughout.
short_summary: The Smith Machine Close-grip Bench Press is a variation of the traditional bench press, targeting the upper body by requiring closer hand positioning while using a machine for support.
